abilities.name: Investigate
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before you attack) you may look at the top 2 cards of any player's deck or at to up 2 of any player's Prizes. Put any cards you looked at back in the same order. This power can't be used if Noctowl is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Triple Smash
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each heads.
